channel.title: Compile errors
channel.description:
Error: [code] Unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Compile Code : [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Compile errors

item.description:
@Reflection317 wrote:

Hmm… I’m not quite sure… It shouldn’t have anything to do with jre7…

Try using the x64 version of Java if you can?

item.title: Compile errors
item.dc:creator: @Reflection317 Reflection317
item.description:
@Reflection317 wrote:

Your compiler is having an issue at the -d stage…

-d isn’t registering on your machine for some reason… Perhaps you could try using another compiler?

Sorry I couldn’t help you much…

Read full topic

item.title: Compile errors
item.dc:creator: @DevilXsummoner DevilXsummoner
item.description:
@DevilXsummoner wrote:

Error:

Unrecognized option: -d
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Compile Code :

@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
